title: After Rafsanjani's speech (Iran)
description:
Protesters march, chant, and sing together after Rafsanjani's 26 Tir 1388 (17 July 2009) Friday prayer sermon criticizing the government.

Read about the speech on Wikinews http://en.wikinews.org/wiki/Former_Iranian_president_Hashemi_Rafsanjani_leads_Friday_prayers

If you want to help, join us at http://iran.whyweprotest.net/

The master list of Anonymous's Iran videos is located at http://gonzotimes.net/?page_id=500
